movies.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
movies.actors: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Peter Cushing
movies.plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

movies.title: Star Trek
movies.actors: Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Leonard Nimoy, Eric Bana
movies.plot: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful Romulan from the future creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.

movies.title: Fred and Barney Meet the Thing
movies.actors: Joe Baker, John Erwin, Art Metrano, Wayne Morton
movies.plot: A show featuring two different cartoon segments,The New Fred and Barney Show (a revival of The Flintstones) and The Thing (based on the Marvel Comics superhero).

movies.title: Presenting Princess Shaw
movies.plot: A documentary on the collaborative relationship between New Orleans based songwriter/YouTube star Samantha Montgomery and composer/video artist Ophir Kutiel.
